name: laravel/wayfinder
description: Added fully type-safe current-route detection with auto-suggestions.
Fixed multi-level nested query parameter resolution.
Prevented route export name conflicts using hash-based suffixing.

name: laravel/react-starter-kit
description: Resolved theme-switching inconsistency by introducing resolvedAppearance, ensuring all components immediately reflect theme updates.
Refactored codebase structure for clarity and performance.
